original_title: Members appointed to EC and HRC
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe has appointed members to both the Election Commission and the Human Rights Commission.

Justice L.T.B. Dehideniya retired Supreme Court Judge appointed as Chairman of the Human Rights Commission (HRC) and R.M.A.L. Rathnayake former Additional Commissioner General of Elections as the Chairman of the Election Commission (HC).
